akn:section.akn:heading: Disposition of judgments and moneys recovered

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7406. Disposition of judgments and moneys recovered All judgments and moneys recovered or received for taxes, costs, forfeitures, and penalties shall be paid to the Secretary as collections of internal revenue taxes. (Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 875; Pub. L. 94–455, title XIX, § 1906(b)(13)(A), Oct. 4, 1976, 90 Stat. 1834.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1976—Pub. L. 94–455 struck out “or his delegate” after “Secretary”.
